function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Densely populated housing types leading to increased transmission of contagious diseases","Impact":"Higher risk of disease spread and outbreaks","Mitigation":"Increasing housing unit area per person and providing private outdoor spaces in the design of apartment buildings","Technologies":"Building design and architecture solutions for maximizing space and privacy","People":"Residents of densely populated housing, particularly apartment buildings","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, and housing developers"},{"Description":"Gated communities as a potential factor in disease spread","Impact":"Risk of creating pockets of infection and limiting interaction with outside community","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, promoting community health education, and ensuring access to essential services within the gated community","Technologies":"Smart community management systems for monitoring and maintaining hygiene standards","People":"Residents of gated communities","Owner":"Community management associations and local health authorities"},{"Description":"Debate around the adequacy of gated communities in relation to the spread of pandemics","Impact":"Uncertainty about the benefits and risks of living in gated communities during a pandemic","Mitigation":"Conducting comprehensive research and analysis to understand the impact of gated community living on disease transmission, and developing adaptable community guidelines","Technologies":"Data analytics and simulation models for evaluating disease transmission in different community settings","People":"Residents of gated communities, urban planners, and public health experts","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions, and community management associations"}]}
